properties.name: argument
properties.description: Positions the annotation relative to a specific argument.

properties.name: component
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: location
properties.description: Specifies an annotation's position on the surface of a specific [argument].

properties.name: render
properties.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

properties.name: series
properties.description: Anchors the annotation to a series point. Accepts the [name] of the point's series.

properties.name: tooltipComponent
properties.description: An alias for the [tooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

properties.name: tooltipRender
properties.description: An alias for the [tooltipTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.
